Player History

Traded from Toledo to Boston (UBA) on 3/2/1965 (Going to PIL: 3B L. Grimmett. Going to TOL: P A. Mathis)...
Injured on 4/29/1965 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/10/1968 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...

Traded from Boston (UBA) to Coney Island on 2/10/1971 (Going to PIL: 1B J. Green. Going to CI: P E. Smith, 3B L. Grimmett)...
Injured on 4/22/1976 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/17/1977, off Ben Adrover (Ash)...
